title: New beta patch gave me 5 lower queue to wait
body:
I was given a lower queue because of the new legue of legends beta patch, that is really bad.
what should I do?
I don't want to wait all that time

replies.body: I'm not sure how a patch could have caused this to occur. Can you provide more details as to what happened?

Yes. I was playing and I locked in my champions. And after a few seconds it send a message with" we are sorry but the system failed to lock in your champions".
This happened a few times

Ah, okay. What this means is that the matchmaking servers didn't receive your input, meaning there was an issue between your computer and the servers that preventing your input from happening. This most often occurs if there's an issue with your local network configuration, so I'd like you to work through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the common solutions for this.

Please let me know if you still experience issues after taking those steps.

Yes. I was playing and I locked in my champions. And after a few seconds it send a message with" we are sorry but the system failed to lock in your champions".
And this happened a few times
